StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetMIContractRegionCMCValue]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @FiscalYear INT, @Region INT, @RegCMCValue INT OUTPUT) AS SELECT @RegCMCValue = MISSION_VALUE FROM MCRISS.dbo.CONTRACTING_MISSION_PLAN_MICONTRACT WHERE FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND ORGANIZATION_ID = @Region AND MONTH_CODE = 0 AND CONTRACTING_MISSION_TYPE = 'CMC'
